name: Mental Matters Hosted By Asekho Toto

episodes.title: #196 - Kim Peirano - Escaped Cult Member Reveals SHOCKING Truths About Spiritual Manipulation!
episodes.description: In this deeply introspective episode of "Mental Matters," host Asekho Toto sits down with a guest, Kim Peirano, who shares their transformative journey from the world of art to becoming a mental health coach. Our guest opens up about the unexpected path that led them from studio art and jewelry making into the realms of acupuncture, yoga, and ultimately, mental health, following a career that initially seemed unrelated. The conversation takes a compelling turn as our guest recounts their personal experience with a New Age cult, which they later discovered bore striking similarities to Scientology. Through this harrowing experience, they explore themes of coercive control, spiritual manipulation, and the process of reclaiming personal autonomy. Discover how they transitioned from victim to victor, employing Jungian psychology, shadow work, and a holistic approach to healing that integrates mind, body, and spirit. This episode sheds light on the psychological impacts of cult involvement, the journey towards recovery, and the empowerment of trusting oneself again. Whether you're interested in mental health, personal growth, or the complexities of spiritual groups, this episode offers profound insights into overcoming adversity through self-awareness and resilience.
